package.name: correct_icp_mapper_pose
package.description: The correct_icp_mapper_pose package provides nodes to translate the rviz pose estimate into tf corrections. correct_icp_pose calls the icp correct_pose service with the received pose. correct_world_odom is a tf publisher for odom_corrected -> odom, starting with an identity transformation. It allows to manipulate the world-odom-base_link chain or any other tf between two frames.
package.author: Florian Kunz
